Signaling System 7 (SS7) Message Transfer Part 2 (MTP2) - User Adaptation Layer
contents.zh-CHS: 信令系统7（SS7）消息传输第2部分（MTP2）-用户适配层

contents.text: Status of this Memo
contents.zh-CHS: 本备忘录的状况

contents.text: This document specifies an Internet standards track protocol for the Internet community, and requests discussion and suggestions for improvements. Please refer to the current edition of the "Internet Official Protocol Standards" (STD 1) for the standardization state and status of this protocol. Distribution of this memo is unlimited.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件规定了互联网社区的互联网标准跟踪协议，并要求进行讨论和提出改进建议。有关本协议的标准化状态和状态，请参考当前版本的“互联网官方协议标准”（STD 1）。本备忘录的分发不受限制。

contents.text: Abstract
contents.zh-CHS: 摘要

contents.text: This document defines a protocol for the backhauling of Signaling System 7 Message Transfer Part 2 (SS7 MTP2) User signalling messages over IP using the Stream Control Transmission Protocol (SCTP). This protocol would be used between a Signalling Gateway (SG) and Media Gateway Controller (MGC). It is assumed that the SG receives SS7 signalling over a standard SS7 interface using the SS7 Message Transfer Part (MTP) to provide transport. The Signalling Gateway would act as a Signalling Link Terminal.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件定义了使用流控制传输协议（SCTP）通过IP回传信令系统7消息传输第2部分（SS7 MTP2）用户信令消息的协议。该协议将在信令网关（SG）和媒体网关控制器（MGC）之间使用。假设SG使用SS7消息传输部分（MTP）通过标准SS7接口接收SS7信令以提供传输。信令网关将充当信令链路终端。

contents.text: Table of Contents
contents.zh-CHS: 目录

contents.text: 1. Introduction
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 介绍

contents.text: This document defines a protocol for the backhauling of SS7 [1] MTP2 User [2] [3] [4] (i.e. MTP3) signalling messages over IP using the Stream Control Transmission Protocol (SCTP) [8]. This protocol would be used between a Signalling Gateway (SG) and Media Gateway Controller (MGC).
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件定义了使用流控制传输协议（SCTP）[8]通过IP回传SS7[1]MTP2用户[2][3][4]（即MTP3）信令消息的协议。该协议将在信令网关（SG）和媒体网关控制器（MGC）之间使用。

contents.text: 1.1 Scope
contents.zh-CHS: 1.1 范围

contents.text: There is a need for Switched Circuit Network (SCN) signalling protocol delivery from a Signalling Gateway (SG) to a Media Gateway Controller (MGC) [9]. The delivery mechanism addresses the following objectives:
contents.zh-CHS: 需要将交换电路网络（SCN）信令协议从信令网关（SG）传送到媒体网关控制器（MGC）[9]。交付机制涉及以下目标：

contents.text: * Support for MTP Level 2 / MTP Level 3 interface boundary * Support for communication between Layer Management modules on SG and MGC * Support for management of SCTP active associations between the SG and MGC
contents.zh-CHS: * 支持MTP 2级/MTP 3级接口边界*支持SG和MGC上的层管理模块之间的通信*支持管理SG和MGC之间的SCTP活动关联

contents.text: The SG will terminate up to MTP Level 2 and the MGC will terminate MTP Level 3 and above. In other words, the SG will transport MTP Level 3 messages over an IP network to a MGC.
contents.zh-CHS: SG将终止至MTP 2级，MGC将终止MTP 3级及以上。换句话说，SG将通过IP网络将MTP级别3消息传输到MGC。

contents.text: 1.2 Terminology
contents.zh-CHS: 1.2 术语

contents.text: Application Server (AS) - A logical entity serving a specific application instance. An example of an Application Server is a MGC handling the MTP Level 3 and call processing for SS7 links terminated by the Signalling Gateways. Practically speaking, an AS is modeled at the SG as an ordered list of one or more related Application Server Processes (e.g., primary, secondary, tertiary, ...).
contents.zh-CHS: 应用程序服务器（AS）-为特定应用程序实例提供服务的逻辑实体。应用服务器的一个示例是处理MTP级别3和信令网关终止的SS7链路的呼叫处理的MGC。实际上，在SG处，AS被建模为一个或多个相关应用服务器进程（例如，主、次、三级等）的有序列表。

contents.text: Application Server Process (ASP) - A process instance of an Application Server. Examples of Application Server Processes are active or standby MGC instances.
contents.zh-CHS: 应用程序服务器进程（ASP）-应用程序服务器的进程实例。应用服务器进程的示例是活动或备用MGC实例。

contents.text: Association - An association refers to a SCTP association. The association will provide the transport for the delivery of protocol data units for one or more interfaces.
contents.zh-CHS: 关联-关联是指SCTP关联。该协会将为一个或多个接口的协议数据单元的交付提供传输。

contents.text: Backhaul - Refers to the transport of signalling from the point of interface for the associated data stream (i.e., SG function in the MGU) back to the point of call processing (i.e., the MGCU), if this is not local [9].
contents.zh-CHS: 回程-指从相关数据流接口点（即MGU中的SG功能）到呼叫处理点（即MGCU）的信令传输，如果这不是本地的[9]。

contents.text: Fail-over - The capability to reroute signalling traffic as required to an alternate Application Server Process within an Application Server in the event of failure or unavailability of a currently used Application Server Process. Fail-back MAY apply upon the return to service of a previously unavailable Application Server Process.
contents.zh-CHS: 故障转移—在当前使用的应用程序服务器进程出现故障或不可用时，根据需要将信令流量重新路由到应用程序服务器内的备用应用程序服务器进程的能力。故障回复可在以前不可用的应用程序服务器进程恢复服务时应用。

contents.text: Host - The computing platform that the ASP process is running on.
contents.zh-CHS: 主机—运行ASP进程的计算平台。

contents.text: Interface - For the purposes of this document, an interface is a SS7 signalling link.
contents.zh-CHS: 接口-在本文件中，接口是SS7信令链路。

contents.text: Interface Identifier - The Interface Identifier identifies the physical interface at the SG for which the signalling messages are sent/received. The format of the Interface Identifier parameter can be text or integer, the values of which are assigned according to network operator policy. The values used are of local significance only, coordinated between the SG and ASP.
contents.zh-CHS: 接口标识符-接口标识符标识SG上发送/接收信令消息的物理接口。接口标识符参数的格式可以是文本或整数，其值根据网络运营商策略分配。使用的值仅具有局部意义，在SG和ASP之间进行协调。

contents.text: Layer Management - Layer Management is a nodal function in an SG or ASP that handles the inputs and outputs between the M2UA layer and a local management entity.
contents.zh-CHS: 层管理-层管理是SG或ASP中的节点功能，用于处理M2UA层和本地管理实体之间的输入和输出。

contents.text: Link Key - The link key is a locally unique (between ASP and SG) value that identifies a registration request for a particular Signalling Data Link and Signalling Terminal pair.
contents.zh-CHS: 链路密钥-链路密钥是本地唯一的（ASP和SG之间）值，用于标识特定信令数据链路和信令终端对的注册请求。

contents.text: MTP - The Message Transfer Part of the SS7 protocol
contents.zh-CHS: MTP-SS7协议的消息传输部分

contents.text: MTP2 - MTP Level 2, the signalling data link layer of SS7
contents.zh-CHS: MTP2-MTP级别2，SS7的信令数据链路层

contents.text: MTP3 - MTP Level 3, the signalling network layer of SS7
contents.zh-CHS: MTP3-MTP级别3，SS7的信令网络层

contents.text: MTP2-User - A protocol that uses the services of MTP Level 2 (i.e. MTP3).
contents.zh-CHS: MTP2用户-使用MTP级别2（即MTP3）服务的协议。

contents.text: Network Byte Order: Most significant byte first, a.k.a Big Endian.
contents.zh-CHS: 网络字节顺序：最高有效字节优先，也称为大端字节。

contents.text: Signalling Data Link - An SDL refers to a specific communications facility that connects two Signalling Link Terminals.
contents.zh-CHS: 信令数据链路-SDL指连接两个信令链路终端的特定通信设施。

contents.text: Signalling Gateway (SG) - An SG is a signalling agent at the edge of the IP network. An SG appears to the SS7 as one or more Signalling Link Terminals that are connected to one or more Signalling Data Links in the SS7 network. An SG contains a set of one or more unique Signalling Gateway Processes, on which one or more is normally actively processing traffic. Where an SG contains more than one SGP, the SG is a logical entity.
contents.zh-CHS: 信令网关（SG）-SG是IP网络边缘的信令代理。在SS7看来，SG是连接到SS7网络中的一个或多个信令数据链路的一个或多个信令链路终端。SG包含一组一个或多个唯一的信令网关进程，其中一个或多个信令网关进程通常正在积极处理流量。如果SG包含多个SGP，则SG是一个逻辑实体。

contents.text: Signalling Gateway Process (SGP) - A process instance that uses M2UA to communicate to and from a Signalling Link Terminal. It serves as an active, backup or load-sharing process of a Signalling Gateway.
contents.zh-CHS: 信令网关进程（SGP）-使用M2UA与信令链路终端进行通信的进程实例。它用作信令网关的活动、备份或负载共享过程。

contents.text: Signalling Link Terminal (SLT) - Refers to the means of performing all of the functions defined at MTP level 2 regardless of their implementation [2,3].
contents.zh-CHS: 信令链路终端（SLT）-指执行MTP 2级定义的所有功能的方式，无论其实现方式如何[2,3]。

contents.text: Stream - A stream refers to an SCTP stream; a unidirectional logical channel established from one SCTP endpoint to another associated SCTP endpoint, within which all user messages are delivered in-sequence except for those submitted to the unordered delivery service.
contents.zh-CHS: 流-流指SCTP流；从一个SCTP端点到另一个相关SCTP端点建立的单向逻辑通道，在该通道内，除提交给无序传递服务的用户消息外，所有用户消息都按顺序传递。

contents.text: 1.3 M2UA Overview
contents.zh-CHS: 1.3 M2UA概述

contents.text: The framework architecture that has been defined for SCN signalling transport over IP [9] uses two components: a signalling common transport protocol and an adaptation module to support the services expected by a particular SCN signalling protocol from its underlying protocol layer.
contents.zh-CHS: 为IP上的SCN信令传输定义的框架架构[9]使用两个组件：信令通用传输协议和适配模块，以支持特定SCN信令协议从其底层协议层预期的服务。

contents.text: Within this framework architecture, this document defines a SCN adaptation module that is suitable for the transport of SS7 MTP2 User messages. The only SS7 MTP2 User is MTP3. The M2UA uses the services of the Stream Control Transmission Protocol [8] as the underlying reliable signalling common transport protocol.
contents.zh-CHS: 在此框架架构内，本文档定义了一个SCN适配模块，该模块适用于SS7 MTP2用户消息的传输。唯一的SS7 MTP2用户是MTP3。M2UA使用流控制传输协议[8]的服务作为底层可靠信令公共传输协议。

contents.text: In a Signalling Gateway, it is expected that the SS7 MTP2-User signalling is transmitted and received from the PSTN over a standard SS7 network interface, using the SS7 Message Transfer Part Level 1 and Level 2 [2,3,4] to provide reliable transport of the MTP3-User signalling messages to and from an SS7 Signalling End Point (SEP) or Signalling Transfer Point (STP). The SG then provides an interworking of transport functions with the IP transport, in order to transfer the MTP2-User signalling messages to and from an Application Server Process where the peer MTP2-User protocol layer exists.
contents.zh-CHS: 在信令网关中，预计SS7 MTP2用户信令通过标准SS7网络接口从PSTN发送和接收，使用SS7消息传输部分1级和2级[2,3,4]提供MTP3用户信令消息到SS7信令端点（SEP）的可靠传输或信令传输点（STP）。然后，SG提供传输功能与IP传输的互通，以便在存在对等MTP2用户协议层的应用服务器进程之间传输MTP2用户信令消息。

contents.text: 1.3.1 Example - SG to MGC
contents.zh-CHS: 1.3.1 示例-SG至MGC

contents.text: In a Signalling Gateway, it is expected that the SS7 signalling is received over a standard SS7 network termination, using the SS7 Message Transfer Part (MTP) to provide transport of SS7 signalling messages to and from an SS7 Signalling End Point (SEP) or SS7 Signalling Transfer Point (STP). In other words, the SG acts as a Signalling Link Terminal (SLT) [2,3]. The SG then provides an interworking of transport functions with IP Signalling Transport, in order to transport the MTP3 signalling messages to the MGC where the peer MTP3 protocol layer exists, as shown below:
contents.zh-CHS: 在信令网关中，预期通过标准的SS7网络终端接收SS7信令，使用SS7消息传输部分（MTP）向SS7信令端点（SEP）或SS7信令传输点（STP）提供SS7信令消息的传输。换句话说，SG充当信令链路终端（SLT）[2,3]。然后，SG提供传输功能与IP信令传输的互通，以便将MTP3信令消息传输到存在对等MTP3协议层的MGC，如下所示：

contents.text: NIF - Nodal Interworking Function SEP - SS7 Signalling Endpoint IP - Internet Protocol SCTP - Stream Control Transmission Protocol (Reference [8])
contents.zh-CHS: NIF-节点互通功能SEP-SS7信令端点IP-互联网协议SCTP-流控制传输协议（参考文献[8]）

contents.text: Figure 1 M2UA in the SG to MGC Application
contents.zh-CHS: 图1 SG至MGC应用中的M2UA

contents.text: Note: STPs MAY be present in the SS7 path between the SEP and the SG.
contents.zh-CHS: 注：SEP和SG之间的SS7路径中可能存在STP。

contents.text: It is recommended that the M2UA use the services of the Stream Control Transmission Protocol (SCTP) [8] as the underlying reliable common signalling transport protocol. The use of SCTP provides the following features:
contents.zh-CHS: 建议M2UA使用流控制传输协议（SCTP）[8]的服务作为底层可靠的通用信令传输协议。SCTP的使用提供了以下功能：

contents.text: - explicit packet-oriented delivery (not stream-oriented) - sequenced delivery of user messages within multiple streams, with an option for order-of-arrival delivery of individual user messages, - optional multiplexing of user messages into SCTP datagrams,
contents.zh-CHS: - 显式面向数据包的交付（非面向流）-在多个流中按顺序交付用户消息，可选择单个用户消息的到达顺序交付，-可选择将用户消息多路复用为SCTP数据报，

contents.text: - network-level fault tolerance through the support of multi-homing at either or both ends of an association, - resistance to flooding and masquerade attacks, and - data segmentation to conform to discovered path MTU size
contents.zh-CHS: - 通过在关联的一端或两端支持多主、抵抗泛洪攻击和伪装攻击，以及数据分割以符合发现的路径MTU大小，实现网络级容错

contents.text: There are scenarios without redundancy requirements and scenarios in which redundancy is supported below the transport layer. In these cases, the SCTP functions above MAY NOT be a requirement and TCP can be used as the underlying common transport protocol.
contents.zh-CHS: 有些场景没有冗余要求，有些场景在传输层下支持冗余。在这些情况下，上述SCTP功能可能不是必需的，TCP可以用作底层公共传输协议。

contents.text: 1.3.2 ASP Fail-over Model and Terminology
contents.zh-CHS: 1.3.2 ASP故障转移模型和术语

contents.text: The M2UA layer supports ASP fail-over functions in order to support a high availability of call and transaction processing capability. All MTP2-User messages incoming to a SGP from the SS7 network are assigned to the unique Application Server, based on the Interface Identifier of the message.
contents.zh-CHS: M2UA层支持ASP故障转移功能，以支持呼叫和事务处理能力的高可用性。根据消息的接口标识符，从SS7网络传入SGP的所有MTP2用户消息都分配给唯一的应用程序服务器。

contents.text: The M2UA layer supports a n+k redundancy model (active-standby, load sharing, broadcast) where n is the minimum number of redundant ASPs required to handle traffic and k ASPs are available to take over for a failed or unavailable ASP. Note that 1+1 active/standby redundancy is a subset of this model. A simplex 1+0 model is also supported as a subset, with no ASP redundancy.
contents.zh-CHS: M2UA层支持n+k冗余模型（主动备用、负载共享、广播），其中n是处理流量所需的最小冗余ASP数量，k个ASP可用于接管故障或不可用的ASP。请注意，1+1主动/备用冗余是该模型的一个子集。simplex 1+0模型也支持作为子集，没有ASP冗余。

contents.text: 1.3.3 Client/Server Model
contents.zh-CHS: 1.3.3 客户机/服务器模型

contents.text: It is recommended that the SGP and ASP be able to support both client and server operation. The peer endpoints using M2UA SHOULD be configured so that one always takes on the role of client and the other the role of server for initiating SCTP associations. The default orientation would be for the SGP to take on the role of server while the ASP is the client. In this case, ASPs SHOULD initiate the SCTP association to the SGP.
contents.zh-CHS: 建议SGP和ASP能够同时支持客户端和服务器操作。应配置使用M2UA的对等端点，以便其中一个始终扮演客户端角色，另一个始终扮演服务器角色，以启动SCTP关联。默认方向是SGP承担服务器角色，而ASP是客户端。在这种情况下，ASP应启动与SGP的SCTP关联。

contents.text: The SCTP and TCP Registered User Port Number Assignment for M2UA is 2904.
contents.zh-CHS: M2UA的SCTP和TCP注册用户端口号分配为2904。

contents.text: 1.4 Services Provided by the M2UA Adaptation Layer
contents.zh-CHS: 1.4 M2UA适配层提供的服务

contents.text: The SS7 MTP3/MTP2(MTP2-User) interface is retained at the termination point in the IP network, so that the M2UA protocol layer is required to provide the equivalent set of services to its users as provided by the MTP Level 2 to MTP Level 3.
contents.zh-CHS: SS7 MTP3/MTP2（MTP2用户）接口保留在IP网络的终端点，因此要求M2UA协议层向其用户提供MTP级别2至MTP级别3提供的等效服务集。

contents.text: 1.4.1 Support for MTP Level 2 / MTP Level 3 interface boundary
contents.zh-CHS: 1.4.1 支持MTP 2级/MTP 3级接口边界

contents.text: M2UA supports a MTP Level 2 / MTP Level 3 interface boundary that enables a seamless, or as seamless as possible, operation of the MTP2-User peers in the SS7 and IP domains. An example of the primitives that need to be supported can be found in [10].
contents.zh-CHS: M2UA支持MTP 2级/MTP 3级接口边界，支持SS7和IP域中MTP2用户对等点的无缝或尽可能无缝的操作。需要支持的原语示例见[10]。

contents.text: 1.4.2 Support for communication between Layer Management modules on SG and MGC
contents.zh-CHS: 1.4.2 支持SG和MGC上的层管理模块之间的通信

contents.text: The M2UA layer needs to provide some messages that will facilitate communication between Layer Management modules on the SG and MGC. To facilitate reporting of errors that arise because of the backhauling MTP Level 3 scenario, the following primitive is defined:
contents.zh-CHS: M2UA层需要提供一些消息，以促进SG和MGC上的层管理模块之间的通信。为了便于报告由于回程MTP 3级方案而产生的错误，定义了以下原语：

contents.text: M-ERROR
contents.zh-CHS: M误差

contents.text: The M-ERROR message is used to indicate an error with a received M2UA message (e.g., an interface identifier value is not known to the SG).
contents.zh-CHS: M错误消息用于指示接收到的M2UA消息的错误（例如，SG不知道接口标识符值）。

contents.text: 1.4.3 Support for management of active associations between SG and MGC
contents.zh-CHS: 1.4.3 支持管理SG和MGC之间的活动关联

contents.text: The M2UA layer on the SG keeps the state of the configured ASPs. A set of primitives between M2UA layer and the Layer Management are defined below to help the Layer Management manage the association(s) between the SG and the MGC. The M2UA layer can be instructed by the Layer Management to establish a SCTP association to a peer M2UA node. This procedure can be achieved using the M-SCTP ESTABLISH primitive.
contents.zh-CHS: SG上的M2UA层保持已配置ASP的状态。下面定义了M2UA层和层管理之间的一组原语，以帮助层管理管理SG和MGC之间的关联。层管理可以指示M2UA层建立与对等M2UA节点的SCTP关联。此过程可使用M-SCTP建立原语实现。

contents.text: M-SCTP_ESTABLISH
contents.zh-CHS: M-SCTP_建立

contents.text: The M-SCTP_ESTABLISH primitive is used to request, indicate and confirm the establishment of a SCTP association to a peer M2UA node.
contents.zh-CHS: M-SCTP_建立原语用于请求、指示和确认建立与对等M2UA节点的SCTP关联。

contents.text: M-SCTP_RELEASE
contents.zh-CHS: M-SCTP_释放

contents.text: The M-SCTP_RELEASE primitives are used to request, indicate, and confirm the release of a SCTP association to a peer M2UA node.
contents.zh-CHS: M-SCTP_释放原语用于请求、指示和确认向对等M2UA节点释放SCTP关联。

contents.text: The M2UA layer MAY also need to inform the status of the SCTP association(s) to the Layer Management. This can be achieved using the following primitive.
contents.zh-CHS: M2UA层可能还需要将SCTP关联的状态通知管理层。这可以使用以下原语实现。

contents.text: M-SCTP_STATUS
contents.zh-CHS: M-SCTP_状态

contents.text: The M-SCTP_STATUS primitive is used to request and indicate the status of underlying SCTP association(s).
contents.zh-CHS: M-SCTP_状态原语用于请求和指示底层SCTP关联的状态。

contents.text: The Layer Management MAY need to inform the M2UA layer of an AS/ASP status (i.e., failure, active, etc.), so that messages can be exchanged between M2UA layer peers to stop traffic to the local M2UA user. This can be achieved using the following primitive.
contents.zh-CHS: 层管理可能需要通知M2UA层AS/ASP状态（即，故障、活动等），以便可以在M2UA层对等方之间交换消息以停止到本地M2UA用户的通信。这可以使用以下原语实现。

contents.text: M-ASP_STATUS
contents.zh-CHS: M-ASP\U状态

contents.text: The ASP status is stored inside the M2UA layer on both the SG and MGC sides. The M-ASP_STATUS primitive can be used by Layer Management to request the status of the Application Server Process from the M2UA layer. This primitive can also be used to indicate the status of the Application Server Process.
contents.zh-CHS: ASP状态存储在SG和MGC侧的M2UA层内。层管理可以使用M-ASP_状态原语从M2UA层请求应用程序服务器进程的状态。此原语还可用于指示应用程序服务器进程的状态。

contents.text: M-ASP_MODIFY
contents.zh-CHS: M-ASP_修改

contents.text: The M-ASP_MODIFY primitive can be used by Layer Management to modify the status of the Application Server Process. In other words, the Layer Management on the ASP side uses this primitive to initiate the ASPM procedures.
contents.zh-CHS: 层管理可以使用M-ASP_MODIFY原语修改应用程序服务器进程的状态。换句话说，ASP端的层管理使用此原语来启动ASPM过程。

contents.text: M-AS_STATUS
contents.zh-CHS: M-AS_状态

contents.text: The M-AS_STATUS primitive can be used by Layer Management to request the status of the Application Server. This primitive can also be used to indicate the status of the Application Server.
contents.zh-CHS: 层管理可以使用M-AS_STATUS原语请求应用程序服务器的状态。此原语还可用于指示应用程序服务器的状态。

contents.text: 1.5 Functions Provided by the M2UA Layer
contents.zh-CHS: 1.5 M2UA层提供的功能

contents.text: 1.5.1 Mapping

The M2UA layer MUST maintain a map of an Interface ID to a physical interface on the Signalling Gateway. A physical interface would be a V.35 line, T1 line/time slot, E1 line/time slot, etc. The M2UA layer MUST also maintain a map of the Interface Identifier to SCTP association and to the related stream within the association.
contents.zh-CHS: M2UA层必须在信令网关上维护接口ID到物理接口的映射。物理接口将是V.35线、T1线/时隙、E1线/时隙等。M2UA层还必须维护接口标识符到SCTP关联和关联内相关流的映射。

contents.text: The SGP maps an Interface Identifier to an SCTP association/stream only when an ASP sends an ASP Active message for a particular Interface Identifier. It must be noted, however, that this mapping is dynamic and could change at any time due to a change of ASP state. This mapping could even temporarily be invalid, for example during fail-over of one ASP to another. Therefore, the SGP MUST maintain the states of AS/ASP and reference them during the routing of any messages to an AS/ASP.
contents.zh-CHS: 只有当ASP发送特定接口标识符的ASP活动消息时，SGP才会将接口标识符映射到SCTP关联/流。但是，必须注意的是，此映射是动态的，并且可能由于ASP状态的更改而随时更改。这种映射甚至可能暂时无效，例如在一个ASP到另一个ASP的故障转移期间。因此，SGP必须维护AS/ASP的状态，并在将任何消息路由到AS/ASP期间引用它们。

contents.text: Note that only one SGP SHOULD provide Signalling Link Terminal services to an SS7 link. Therefore, within an SG, an Application Server SHOULD be active for only one SGP at any given point in time.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，只有一个SGP应向SS7链路提供信令链路终端服务。因此，在一个SG中，在任何给定的时间点，一个应用服务器应该只对一个SGP处于活动状态。

contents.text: An example of the logical view of the relationship between an SS7 link, Interface Identifier, AS and ASP in an SGP is shown below:
contents.zh-CHS: SGP中SS7链路、接口标识符AS和ASP之间关系的逻辑视图示例如下所示：

contents.text: where IID = Interface Identifier
contents.zh-CHS: 其中IID=接口标识符

contents.text: A SGP MAY support more than one AS. An AS MAY support more than one Interface Identifier.
contents.zh-CHS: SGP可以支持多个AS。AS可以支持多个接口标识符。

contents.text: 1.5.2 Support for the management of SCTP associations between the SGPs and ASPs
contents.zh-CHS: 1.5.2 支持SGP和ASP之间SCTP关联的管理

contents.text: The M2UA layer at the SG maintains the availability state of all configured ASPs, in order to manage the SCTP associations and the traffic between the SG and ASPs. As well, the active/inactive state of remote ASP(s) are also maintained. The Active ASP(s) are the one(s) currently receiving traffic from the SG.
contents.zh-CHS: SG处的M2UA层维护所有配置的ASP的可用性状态，以便管理SCTP关联以及SG和ASP之间的流量。此外，还将维护远程ASP的活动/非活动状态。活动ASP是当前从SG接收流量的ASP。

contents.text: The M2UA layer MAY be instructed by local management to establish an SCTP association to a peer M2UA node. This can be achieved using the M-SCTP_ESTABLISH primitive to request, indicate and confirm the establishment of an SCTP association with a peer M2UA node.
contents.zh-CHS: 本地管理层可以指示M2UA层建立与对等M2UA节点的SCTP关联。这可以使用M-SCTP\u-build原语来请求、指示和确认与对等M2UA节点建立SCTP关联。

contents.text: The M2UA layer MAY also need to inform local management of the status of the underlying SCTP associations using the M-SCTP_STATUS request and the indication primitive. For example, the M2UA MAY inform local management of the reason for the release of an SCTP association, determined either locally within the M2UA layer or by a primitive from the SCTP.
contents.zh-CHS: M2UA层可能还需要使用M-SCTP_状态请求和指示原语通知本地管理层底层SCTP关联的状态。例如，M2UA可以通知本地管理层释放SCTP关联的原因，该关联可以在M2UA层内本地确定，也可以由来自SCTP的原语确定。

contents.text: Also the M2UA layer may need to inform the local management of the change in status of an ASP or AS. This may be achieved using the M-ASP STATUS request or M-AS_STATUS request primitives.
contents.zh-CHS: 此外，M2UA层可能需要通知本地管理层ASP或AS状态的变化。这可以通过使用M-ASP状态请求或M-AS_状态请求原语来实现。

contents.text: 1.5.3 Status of ASPs
contents.zh-CHS: 1.5.3 ASPs的现状

contents.text: The M2UA layer on the SG MUST maintain the state of the ASPs it is supporting. The state of an ASP changes because of the reception of peer-to-peer messages (ASPM messages as described in Section 3.3.2) or the reception of indications from the local SCTP association. The ASP state transition procedures are described in Section 4.3.1.
contents.zh-CHS: SG上的M2UA层必须保持其支持的ASP的状态。由于接收到对等消息（如第3.3.2节所述的ASPM消息）或接收到来自本地SCTP协会的指示，ASP的状态会发生变化。第4.3.1节描述了ASP状态转换程序。

contents.text: At a SGP, an Application Server list MAY contain active and inactive ASPs to support ASP fail-over procedures. When, for example, both a primary and a backup ASP are available, the M2UA peer protocol is required to control which ASP is currently active. The ordered list of ASPs within a logical Application Server is kept updated in the SGP to reflect the active Application Server Process.
contents.zh-CHS: 在SGP中，应用程序服务器列表可能包含活动和非活动的ASP，以支持ASP故障转移过程。例如，当主ASP和备份ASP都可用时，需要M2UA对等协议来控制哪个ASP当前处于活动状态。逻辑应用程序服务器中的ASP有序列表在SGP中保持更新，以反映活动的应用程序服务器进程。

contents.text: Also the M2UA layer MAY need to inform the local management of the change in status of an ASP or AS. This can be achieved using the M-ASP_STATUS or M-AS_STATUS primitives.
contents.zh-CHS: 此外，M2UA层可能需要通知本地管理层ASP或AS状态的变化。这可以通过使用M-ASP_状态或M-AS_状态原语来实现。

contents.text: 1.5.4 SCTP Specifics
contents.zh-CHS: 1.5.4 SCTP细节

contents.text: 1.5.4.1 SCTP Stream Management

SCTP allows a user specified number of streams to be opened during initialization of the association. It is the responsibility of the M2UA layer to ensure proper management of these streams. Because of the unidirectional nature of streams, a M2UA layer is not aware of the stream information from its peer M2UA layer. For this reason, the Interface Identifier is in the M2UA message header.
contents.zh-CHS: SCTP允许在关联初始化期间打开用户指定数量的流。M2UA层负责确保这些流的正确管理。由于流的单向性，M2UA层不知道来自其对等M2UA层的流信息。因此，接口标识符位于M2UA消息头中。

contents.text: The use of SCTP streams within M2UA is recommended in order to minimize transmission and buffering delay, thereby, improving the overall performance and reliability of the signalling elements. A separate SCTP stream can be used for each SS7 link. Or, an implementation may choose to split the SS7 link across several streams based on SLS. This method may be of particular interest for high speed SS7 links (MTP3b) since high speed links have a 24-bit sequence number and the stream sequence number is 16-bits.
contents.zh-CHS: 建议在M2UA中使用SCTP流，以最小化传输和缓冲延迟，从而提高信令元件的整体性能和可靠性。每个SS7链路都可以使用单独的SCTP流。或者，实现可以选择基于SLS在多个流之间分割SS7链路。由于高速链路具有24位序列号且流序列号为16位，因此该方法可能对高速SS7链路（MTP3b）特别感兴趣。

contents.text: SCTP Stream '0' SHOULD NOT be used for MTP2 User Adaptation (MAUP) messages (see Section 3) since stream '0' SHOULD only be used for ASP Management (ASPM) messages (see Section 4.3.3).
contents.zh-CHS: SCTP流“0”不应用于MTP2用户自适应（MAUP）消息（请参阅第3节），因为流“0”应仅用于ASP管理（ASPM）消息（请参阅第4.3.3节）。

contents.text: 1.5.5 Seamless SS7 Network Management Interworking
contents.zh-CHS: 1.5.5 无缝SS7网络管理互通

contents.text: The M2UA layer on the SGP SHOULD pass an indication of unavailability of the M2UA-User (MTP3) to the local Layer Management, if the currently active ASP moves from the ACTIVE state. The actions taken by M2UA on the SGP with regards to MTP Level 2 should be in accordance with the appropriate MTP specifications.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果当前活动的ASP从活动状态移动，则SGP上的M2UA层应将M2UA用户（MTP3）不可用的指示传递给本地层管理。M2UA对SGP采取的与MTP 2级相关的行动应符合适当的MTP规范。

contents.text: 1.5.6 Flow Control / Congestion
contents.zh-CHS: 1.5.6 流量控制/阻塞

contents.text: It is possible for the M2UA layer to be informed of the IP network congestion onset and abatement by means of an implementation dependent function (i.e. an indication from the SCTP). The handling of this congestion indication by M2UA is implementation dependent. However, the actions taken by the SG should be in accordance with the appropriate MTP specification and should enable SS7 functionality (e.g. flow control) to be correctly maintained.
contents.zh-CHS: M2UA层可以通过依赖于实现的功能（即来自SCTP的指示）被告知IP网络拥塞的开始和缓解。M2UA对该拥塞指示的处理取决于实现。但是，SG采取的行动应符合适当的MTP规范，并应能够正确维护SS7功能（如流量控制）。

contents.text: 1.5.7 Audit of SS7 Link State
contents.zh-CHS: 1.5.7 审核七号信令链路状态

contents.text: After a fail-over of one ASP to another ASP, it may be necessary for the M2UA on the ASP to audit the current SS7 link state to ensure consistency. The M2UA on the SGP would respond to the audit request with information regarding the current state of the SS7 link (i.e. in-service, out-of-service, congestion state, LPO/RPO state).
contents.zh-CHS: 在一个ASP故障切换到另一个ASP后，ASP上的M2UA可能需要审核当前SS7链路状态以确保一致性。SGP上的M2UA将使用有关SS7链路当前状态（即在用、停用、拥塞状态、LPO/RPO状态）的信息响应审计请求。

contents.text: 1.6 Definition of the M2UA Boundaries
contents.zh-CHS: 1.6 M2UA边界的定义

contents.text: 1.6.1 Definition of the M2UA / MTP Level 3 boundary
contents.zh-CHS: 1.6.1 M2UA/MTP三级边界的定义

contents.text: DATA ESTABLISH RELEASE STATE DATA RETRIEVAL DATA RETRIEVAL COMPLETE
contents.zh-CHS: 数据建立发布状态数据检索数据检索完成

contents.text: 1.6.2 Definition of the M2UA / MTP Level 2 boundary
contents.zh-CHS: 1.6.2 M2UA/MTP二级边界的定义

contents.text: DATA ESTABLISH RELEASE STATE DATA RETRIEVAL DATA RETRIEVAL COMPLETE
contents.zh-CHS: 数据建立发布状态数据检索数据检索完成

contents.text: 1.6.3 Definition of the Lower Layer Boundary between M2UA and SCTP
contents.zh-CHS: 1.6.3 M2UA和SCTP之间下层边界的定义

contents.text: The upper layer and layer management primitives provided by SCTP are provided in Reference [8] Section 10.
contents.zh-CHS: 参考文献[8]第10节提供了SCTP提供的上层和层管理原语。

contents.text: 1.6.4 Definition of Layer Management / M2UA Boundary
contents.zh-CHS: 1.6.4 层管理/M2UA边界的定义

contents.text: M-SCTP_ESTABLISH request Direction: LM -> M2UA Purpose: LM requests ASP to establish an SCTP association with an SGP.
contents.zh-CHS: M-SCTP_建立请求方向：LM->M2UA目的：LM请求ASP与SGP建立SCTP关联。

contents.text: M-SCTP_ESTABLISH confirm Direction: M2UA -> LM Purpose: ASP confirms to LM that it has established an SCTP association with an SGP.
contents.zh-CHS: M-SCTP_建立确认方向：M2UA->LM目的：ASP向LM确认其已与SGP建立SCTP关联。

contents.text: M-SCTP_ESTABLISH indication Direction: M2UA -> LM Purpose: SGP informs LM that an ASP has established an SCTP association.
contents.zh-CHS: M-SCTP_建立指示方向：M2UA->LM目的：SGP通知LM ASP已建立SCTP关联。

contents.text: M-SCTP_RELEASE request Direction: LM -> M2UA Purpose: LM requests ASP to release an SCTP association with SGP.
contents.zh-CHS: M-SCTP_发布请求方向：LM->M2UA目的：LM请求ASP发布与SGP的SCTP关联。

contents.text: M-SCTP_RELEASE confirm Direction: M2UA -> LM Purpose: ASP confirms to LM that it has released SCTP association with SGP.
contents.zh-CHS: M-SCTP_发布确认方向：M2UA->LM目的：ASP向LM确认其已发布与SGP的SCTP关联。

contents.text: M-SCTP_RELEASE indication Direction: M2UA -> LM Purpose: SGP informs LM that ASP has released an SCTP association.
contents.zh-CHS: M-SCTP_释放指示方向：M2UA->LM目的：SGP通知LM ASP已释放SCTP关联。

contents.text: M-SCTP_RESTART indication Direction: M2UA -> LM Purpose: M2UA informs LM that a SCTP Restart indication has been received.
contents.zh-CHS: M-SCTP_重启指示方向：M2UA->LM目的：M2UA通知LM已收到SCTP重启指示。

contents.text: M-SCTP_STATUS request Direction: LM -> M2UA Purpose: LM requests M2UA to report status of SCTP association.
contents.zh-CHS: M-SCTP_状态请求方向：LM->M2UA目的：LM请求M2UA报告SCTP关联状态。

contents.text: M-SCTP_STATUS indication Direction: M2UA -> LM Purpose: M2UA reports status of SCTP association.
contents.zh-CHS: M-SCTP_状态指示方向：M2UA->LM目的：M2UA报告SCTP关联的状态。

contents.text: M-ASP_STATUS request Direction: LM -> M2UA Purpose: LM requests SGP to report status of remote ASP.
contents.zh-CHS: M-ASP_状态请求方向：LM->M2UA目的：LM请求SGP报告远程ASP的状态。

contents.text: M-ASP_STATUS indication Direction: M2UA -> LM Purpose: SGP reports status of remote ASP.
contents.zh-CHS: M-ASP_状态指示方向：M2UA->LM目的：SGP报告远程ASP的状态。

contents.text: M-AS_STATUS request Direction: LM -> M2UA Purpose: LM requests SG to report status of AS.
contents.zh-CHS: M-AS_状态请求方向：LM->M2UA目的：LM请求SG报告AS状态。

contents.text: M-AS_STATUS indication Direction: M2UA -> LM Purpose: SG reports status of AS.
contents.zh-CHS: M-AS_状态指示方向：M2UA->LM目的：SG报告AS状态。

contents.text: M-NOTIFY indication Direction: M2UA -> LM Purpose: ASP reports that it has received a NOTIFY message from its peer.
contents.zh-CHS: M-NOTIFY指示方向：M2UA->LM目的：ASP报告它已收到来自其对等方的NOTIFY消息。

contents.text: M-ERROR indication Direction: M2UA -> LM Purpose: ASP or SGP reports that it has received an ERROR message from its peer.
contents.zh-CHS: M-错误指示方向：M2UA->LM目的：ASP或SGP报告其已收到来自其对等方的错误消息。

contents.text: M-ASP_UP request Direction: LM -> M2UA Purpose: LM requests ASP to start its operation and send an ASP UP message to the SGP.
contents.zh-CHS: M-ASP_UP请求方向：LM->M2UA目的：LM请求ASP启动其操作，并向SGP发送ASP UP消息。

contents.text: M-ASP_UP confirm Direction: M2UA -> LM Purpose: ASP reports that it has received an ASP UP Acknowledgment message from the SGP.
contents.zh-CHS: M-ASP_UP confirm Direction:M2UA->LM Purpose:ASP报告已收到来自SGP的ASP UP确认消息。

contents.text: M-ASP_DOWN request Direction: LM -> M2UA Purpose: LM requests ASP to stop its operation and send an ASP DOWN message to the SGP.
contents.zh-CHS: M-ASP_DOWN请求方向：LM->M2UA目的：LM请求ASP停止其操作，并向SGP发送ASP DOWN消息。

contents.text: M-ASP_DOWN confirm Direction: M2UA -> LM Purpose: ASP reports that is has received an ASP DOWN Acknowledgment message from the SGP.
contents.zh-CHS: M-ASP_向下确认方向：M2UA->LM目的：接收到来自SGP的ASP向下确认消息的ASP报告。

contents.text: M-ASP_ACTIVE request Direction: LM -> M2UA Purpose: LM requests ASP to send an ASP ACTIVE message to the SGP.
contents.zh-CHS: M-ASP_活动请求方向：LM->M2UA目的：LM请求ASP向SGP发送ASP活动消息。

contents.text: M-ASP_ACTIVE confirm Direction: M2UA -> LM Purpose: ASP reports that is has received an ASP ACTIVE Acknowledgment message from the SGP.
contents.zh-CHS: M-ASP_活动确认方向：M2UA->LM目的：收到来自SGP的ASP活动确认消息的ASP报告。

contents.text: M-ASP_INACTIVE request Direction: LM -> M2UA Purpose: LM requests ASP to send an ASP INACTIVE message to the SGP.
contents.zh-CHS: M-ASP_非活动请求方向：LM->M2UA目的：LM请求ASP向SGP发送ASP非活动消息。

contents.text: M-ASP_INACTIVE confirm Direction: M2UA -> LM Purpose: ASP reports that is has received an ASP INACTIVE Acknowledgment message from the SGP.
contents.zh-CHS: M-ASP_非活动确认方向：M2UA->LM目的：接收到来自SGP的ASP非活动确认消息的ASP报告。

contents.text: M-LINK_KEY_REG Request Direction: LM -> M2UA Purpose: LM requests ASP to register Link Key with SG by sending REG REQ message.
contents.zh-CHS: M-LINK_KEY_REG请求方向：LM->M2UA目的：LM通过发送REG REQ消息请求ASP向SG注册链接密钥。

contents.text: M-LINK_KEY_REG Confirm Direction: M2UA -> LM Purpose: ASP reports to LM that it has successfully received a REG RSP message from SG.
contents.zh-CHS: M-LINK_KEY_REG确认方向：M2UA->LM目的：ASP向LM报告其已成功接收到来自SG的REG RSP消息。

contents.text: M-LINK_KEY_REG Indication Direction: M2UA -> LM Purpose: SG reports to LM that it has successfully processed an incoming REG REQ message from ASP.
contents.zh-CHS: M-LINK_KEY_REG指示方向：M2UA->LM目的：SG向LM报告其已成功处理来自ASP的传入REG REQ消息。

contents.text: M-LINK_KEY_DEREG Request Direction: LM -> M2UA Purpose: LM requests ASP to de-register Link Key with SG by sending DEREG REQ message.
contents.zh-CHS: M-LINK_KEY_DEREG请求方向：LM->M2UA目的：LM通过发送DEREG REQ消息请求ASP向SG注销链路密钥。

contents.text: M-LINK_KEY_DEREG Confirm Direction: M2UA -> LM Purpose: ASP reports to LM that it has successfully received a DEREG RSP message from SG.
contents.zh-CHS: M-LINK_KEY_DEREG Confirm Direction:M2UA->LM Purpose:ASP向LM报告其已成功接收到来自SG的DEREG RSP消息。

contents.text: M-LINK_KEY_DEREG Indication Direction: M2UA -> LM Purpose: SG reports to LM that it has successfully processed an incoming DEREG REQ message from ASP.
contents.zh-CHS: M-LINK_KEY_DEREG指示方向：M2UA->LM目的：SG向LM报告其已成功处理来自ASP的传入DEREG REQ消息。

contents.text: 2.0 Conventions
contents.zh-CHS: 2.0 习俗

contents.text: The keywords MUST, MUST NOT, REQUIRED, SHALL, SHALL NOT, SHOULD, SHOULD NOT, RECOMMENDED, NOT RECOMMENDED, MAY, and OPTIONAL, when they appear in this document, are to be interpreted as described in [RFC2119].
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件中出现的关键词必须、不得、必需、应、不应、应、不应、推荐、不推荐、可和可选时，应按照[RFC2119]中的说明进行解释。

contents.text: 3.0 Protocol Elements
contents.zh-CHS: 3.0 协议要素

contents.text: This section describes the format of various messages used in this protocol.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节介绍本协议中使用的各种消息的格式。

contents.text: 3.1 Common Message Header
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1 公共消息头

contents.text: The protocol messages for MTP2-User Adaptation require a message structure that contains a version, message class, message type, message length, and message contents. This message header is common among all signalling protocol adaptation layers:
contents.zh-CHS: MTP2用户自适应的协议消息需要包含版本、消息类、消息类型、消息长度和消息内容的消息结构。此消息头在所有信令协议适配层中是通用的：

contents.text: Figure 2 Common Message Header
contents.zh-CHS: 图2公共消息头

contents.text: All fields in an M2UA message MUST be transmitted in the network byte order, unless otherwise stated.
contents.zh-CHS: 除非另有说明，M2UA消息中的所有字段必须以网络字节顺序传输。

contents.text: 3.1.1 Version
The version field contains the version of the M2UA adaptation layer. The supported versions are:
contents.zh-CHS: 版本字段包含M2UA适配层的版本。受支持的版本包括：

contents.text:
Value    Version
-----    -------
  1      Release 1.0
3.1.2 Spare
The Spare field is 8-bits. It SHOULD be set to all '0's by the sender and ignored by the receiver.
contents.zh-CHS: 备用字段为8位。发送方应将其设置为所有“0”，接收方应将其忽略。

contents.text: 3.1.3 Message Class
The following List contains the valid Message Classes:
contents.zh-CHS: 以下列表包含有效的消息类：

contents.text: Message Class: 8 bits (unsigned integer)
contents.zh-CHS: 消息类：8位（无符号整数）

contents.text:
0      Management (MGMT) Message [IUA/M2UA/M3UA/SUA]
     1      Transfer Messages [M3UA]
     2      SS7 Signalling Network Management (SSNM) Messages [M3UA/SUA]
     3      ASP State Maintenance (ASPSM) Messages [IUA/M2UA/M3UA/SUA]
     4      ASP Traffic Maintenance (ASPTM) Messages [IUA/M2UA/M3UA/SUA]
     5      Q.921/Q.931 Boundary Primitives Transport (QPTM)
            Messages [IUA]
     6      MTP2 User Adaptation (MAUP) Messages [M2UA]
     7      Connectionless Messages [SUA]
     8      Connection-Oriented Messages [SUA]
     9      Routing Key Management (RKM) Messages (M3UA)
    10      Interface Identifier Management (IIM) Messages (M2UA)
 11 to 127  Reserved by the IETF
128 to 255  Reserved for IETF-Defined Message Class extensions
3.1.4 Message Type
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1.4 消息类型

contents.text: The following List contains the Message Types for the valid Message Classes:
contents.zh-CHS: 以下列表包含有效消息类的消息类型：

contents.text: MTP2 User Adaptation (MAUP) Messages
contents.zh-CHS: MTP2用户自适应（MAUP）消息

contents.text: 0 Reserved 1 Data 2 Establish Request 3 Establish Confirm 4 Release Request 5 Release Confirm 6 Release Indication 7 State Request 8 State Confirm 9 State Indication 10 Data Retrieval Request 11 Data Retrieval Confirm 12 Data Retrieval Indication 13 Data Retrieval Complete Indication 14 Congestion Indication 15 Data Acknowledge 16 to 127 Reserved by the IETF 128 to 255 Reserved for IETF-Defined MAUP extensions
contents.zh-CHS: 0保留1数据2建立请求3建立确认4释放请求5释放确认6释放指示7状态请求8状态确认9状态指示10数据检索请求11数据检索确认12数据检索指示13数据检索完成指示14拥塞指示15数据确认16至127保留由IETF 128到255为IETF定义的MAUP扩展保留

contents.text: Application Server Process State Maintenance (ASPSM) messages
contents.zh-CHS: 应用程序服务器进程状态维护（ASPSM）消息

contents.text: 0 Reserved 1 ASP Up (UP) 2 ASP Down (DOWN) 3 Heartbeat (BEAT) 4 ASP Up Ack (UP ACK) 5 ASP Down Ack (DOWN ACK) 6 Heartbeat Ack (BEAT ACK) 7 to 127 Reserved by the IETF 128 to 255 Reserved for IETF-Defined ASPSM extensions
contents.zh-CHS: 0保留1 ASP向上（向上）2 ASP向下（向下）3心跳（节拍）4 ASP向上确认（向上确认）5 ASP向下确认（向下确认）6心跳确认（节拍确认）7到127由IETF保留128到255为IETF定义的ASPSM扩展保留

contents.text: Application Server Process Traffic Maintenance (ASPTM) messages
contents.zh-CHS: 应用程序服务器进程流量维护（ASPTM）消息

contents.text: 0 Reserved 1 ASP Active (ACTIVE) 2 ASP Inactive (INACTIVE) 3 ASP Active Ack (ACTIVE ACK) 4 ASP Inactive Ack (INACTIVE ACK) 5 to 127 Reserved by the IETF 128 to 255 Reserved for IETF-Defined ASPTM extensions
contents.zh-CHS: 0保留1 ASP活动（活动）2 ASP非活动（非活动）3 ASP活动确认（活动确认）4 ASP非活动确认（非活动确认）5到127由IETF保留128到255为IETF定义的ASPTM扩展保留

contents.text: Management (MGMT) Messages
contents.zh-CHS: 管理（MGMT）消息

contents.text: 0 Error (ERR) 1 Notify (NTFY) 2 to 127 Reserved by the IETF 128 to 255 Reserved for IETF-Defined MGMT extensions
contents.zh-CHS: 0错误（ERR）1通知（NTFY）2到127由IETF保留128到255为IETF定义的管理扩展保留

contents.text: Interface Identifier Management (IIM) Messages
contents.zh-CHS: 接口标识符管理（IIM）消息

contents.text: 0 Reserved 1 Registration Request (REG REQ) 2 Registration Response (REG RSP) 3 Deregistration Request (DEREG REQ) 4 Deregistration Response (DEREG RSP) 5 to 127 Reserved by the IETF 128 to 255 Reserved for IETF-Defined IIM extensions
contents.zh-CHS: 0保留1注册请求（REG REQ）2注册响应（REG RSP）3注销请求（DEREG REQ）4注销响应（DEREG RSP）5到127由IETF保留128到255为IETF定义的IIM扩展保留

contents.text: 3.1.5 Message Length
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1.5 消息长度

contents.text: The Message Length defines the length of the message in octets, including the header. The Message Length MUST include parameter padding bytes, if any. The Message Length MUST NOT be longer than a MTP3 message [2,3,4,5] plus the length of the common and M2UA message headers.
contents.zh-CHS: 消息长度以八位字节定义消息的长度，包括消息头。消息长度必须包括参数填充字节（如果有）。消息长度不得超过MTP3消息[2,3,4,5]加上公共和M2UA消息头的长度。

contents.text: 3.1.6 Variable-Length Parameter Format
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1.6 可变长度参数格式

contents.text: M2UA messages consist of a Common Header followed by zero or more variable-length parameters, as defined by the message type. The variable-length parameters contained in a message are defined in a Tag-Length-Value format as shown below.
contents.zh-CHS: M2UA消息由一个公共头和零个或多个可变长度参数组成，这些参数由消息类型定义。消息中包含的可变长度参数以标记长度值格式定义，如下所示。

contents.text: Mandatory parameters MUST be placed before optional parameters in a message.
contents.zh-CHS: 在消息中，必须将强制参数置于可选参数之前。

contents.text: Parameter Tag: 16 bits (unsigned integer)
contents.zh-CHS: 参数标记：16位（无符号整数）

contents.text: The Type field is a 16 bit identifier of the type of parameter. It takes a value of 0 to 65534. The common parameters used by the adaptation layers are in the range of 0x00 to 0xff. The M2UA specific parameters have Tags in the range 0x300 to 0x3ff.
contents.zh-CHS: 类型字段是参数类型的16位标识符。它的值为0到65534。自适应层使用的公共参数在0x00到0xff的范围内。M2UA特定参数的标记范围为0x300至0x3ff。

contents.text: The common parameter tags (used by all User Adaptation layers) that M2UA uses are defined below:
contents.zh-CHS: M2UA使用的通用参数标签（由所有用户适配层使用）定义如下：

contents.text:
Parameter Value     Parameter Name
---------------     --------------
      0 (0x00)       Reserved
      1 (0x01)       Interface Identifier (Integer)
      2 (0x02)       Unused
      3 (0x03)       Interface Identifier (Text)
      4 (0x04)       Info String
      5 (0x05)       Unused
      6 (0x06)       Unused
      7 (0x07)       Diagnostic Information
      8 (0x08)       Interface Identifier (Integer Range)
      9 (0x09)       Heartbeat Data
     10 (0x0a)       Unused
     11 (0x0b)       Traffic Mode Type
     12 (0x0c)       Error Code
     13 (0x0d)       Status Type/Information
     14 (0x0e)       Unused
     15 (0x0f)       Unused
     16 (0x10)       Unused
     17 (0x11)       ASP Identifier
     18 (0x12)       Unused
     19 (0x13)       Correlation Id
    18-255           Reserved
The M2UA specific parameter Tags defined are as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 定义的M2UA特定参数标记如下：

contents.text:
Parameter Value     Parameter Name
---------------     --------------
  768 (0x0300)      Protocol Data 1
  769 (0x0301)      Protocol Data 2 (TTC)
  770 (0x0302)      State Request
  771 (0x0303)      State Event
  772 (0x0304)      Congestion Status
  773 (0x0305)      Discard Status
  774 (0x0306)      Action
  775 (0x0307)      Sequence Number
  776 (0x0308)      Retrieval Result
  777 (0x0309)      Link Key
  778 (0x030a)      Local-LK-Identifier
  779 (0x030b)      Signalling Data Terminal (SDT) Identifier
  780 (0x030c)      Signalling Data Link (SDL) Identifier
  781 (0x030d)      Registration Result
  782 (0x030e)      Registration Status
  783 (0x030f)      De-Registration Result
  784 (0x0310)      De-Registration Status
Parameter Length: 16 bits (unsigned integer)
contents.zh-CHS: 参数长度：16位（无符号整数）

contents.text: The Parameter Length field contains the size of the parameter in bytes, including the Parameter Tag, Parameter Length, and Parameter Value fields. Thus, a parameter with a zero-length Parameter Value field would have a Length field of 4. The Parameter Length does not include any padding bytes.
contents.zh-CHS: 参数长度字段包含以字节为单位的参数大小，包括参数标记、参数长度和参数值字段。因此，具有零长度参数值字段的参数的长度字段为4。参数长度不包括任何填充字节。

contents.text: Parameter Value: variable-length.
contents.zh-CHS: 参数值：可变长度。

contents.text: The Parameter Value field contains the actual information to be transferred in the parameter.
contents.zh-CHS: 参数值字段包含要在参数中传输的实际信息。

contents.text: The total length of a parameter (including Tag, Parameter Length and Value fields) MUST be a multiple of 4 bytes. If the length of the parameter is not a multiple of 4 bytes, the sender pads the Parameter at the end (i.e., after the Parameter Value field) with all zero bytes. The length of the padding is NOT included in the parameter length field. A sender MUST NOT pad with more than 3 bytes. The receiver MUST ignore the padding bytes.
contents.zh-CHS: 参数的总长度（包括标记、参数长度和值字段）必须是4字节的倍数。如果参数的长度不是4字节的倍数，则发送方在参数末尾（即参数值字段之后）填充所有零字节。填充的长度不包括在参数长度字段中。发送方的填充长度不得超过3个字节。接收器必须忽略填充字节。

contents.text: 3.2 M2UA Message Header
contents.zh-CHS: 3.2 M2UA消息头

contents.text: In addition to the common message header, there will be a M2UA specific message header. The M2UA specific message header will immediately follow the common message header, but will only be used with MAUP messages.
contents.zh-CHS: 除了公共消息头之外，还将有一个M2UA特定的消息头。M2UA特定消息头将紧跟在公共消息头之后，但仅用于MAUP消息。

contents.text: This message header will contain the Interface Identifier. The Interface Identifier identifies the physical interface at the SG for which the signalling messages are sent/received. The format of the Interface Identifier parameter can be text or integer, the values of which are assigned according to network operator policy. The values used are of local significance only, coordinated between the SG and ASP.
contents.zh-CHS: 此消息头将包含接口标识符。接口标识符标识SG上发送/接收信令消息的物理接口。接口标识符参数的格式可以是文本或整数，其值根据网络运营商策略分配。使用的值仅具有局部意义，在SG和ASP之间进行协调。

contents.text: The integer formatted Interface Identifier MUST be supported. The text formatted Interface Identifier MAY optionally be supported.
contents.zh-CHS: 必须支持整数格式的接口标识符。可以选择支持文本格式的接口标识符。

contents.text: Figure 3 M2UA Message Header (Integer-based Interface Identifier)
contents.zh-CHS: 图3 M2UA消息头（基于整数的接口标识符）

contents.text: The Tag value for the Integer-based Interface Identifier is 0x1. The length is always set to a value of 8.
contents.zh-CHS: 基于整数的接口标识符的标记值为0x1。长度始终设置为8的值。

contents.text: Figure 4 M2UA Message Header (Text-based Interface Identifier)
contents.zh-CHS: 图4 M2UA消息头（基于文本的接口标识符）

contents.text: The Tag value for the Text-based Interface Identifier is 0x3. The encoding of the Identifier is ANSI X3.4-1986 [7]. The maximum string length of the text-based Interface Identifier is 255 octets. The tag length is equal to the string length of the Interface Identifier name plus four bytes for the Tag and Length fields.
contents.zh-CHS: 基于文本的接口标识符的标记值为0x3。标识符的编码为ANSI X3.4-1986[7]。基于文本的接口标识符的最大字符串长度为255个八位字节。标记长度等于接口标识符名称的字符串长度加上标记和长度字段的四个字节。

contents.text: 3.3 M2UA Messages
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3 M2UA消息

contents.text: The following section defines the messages and parameter contents. The M2UA messages will use the common message header (Figure 2) and the M2UA message header (Figure 3 and Figure 4).
contents.zh-CHS: 以下部分定义了消息和参数内容。M2UA消息将使用公共消息头（图2）和M2UA消息头（图3和图4）。

contents.text: 3.3.1 MTP2 User Adaptation Messages
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3.1 MTP2用户自适应消息

contents.text: The Data message contains an SS7 MTP2-User Protocol Data Unit (PDU). The Data message contains the following parameter:
contents.zh-CHS: 数据消息包含一个SS7 MTP2用户协议数据单元（PDU）。数据消息包含以下参数：

contents.text: Protocol Data (mandatory) Correlation Id (optional)
contents.zh-CHS: 协议数据（必需）关联Id（可选）

contents.text: The format for the Data Message parameters is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 数据消息参数的格式如下所示：

contents.text: The Protocol Data field contains the MTP2-User application message in network byte order starting with the Signalling Information Octet (SIO). The Correlation Id parameter uniquely identifies the MSU carried in the Protocol Data within an AS. This Correlation Id parameter is assigned by the sending M2UA. The purpose of the Correlation Id is to permit the newly active ASP to synchronize its processing of the traffic in each ordered stream with other ASPs in the broadcast group.
contents.zh-CHS: 协议数据字段以网络字节顺序包含MTP2用户应用程序消息，从信令信息八位字节（SIO）开始。Correlation Id参数唯一标识AS中协议数据中携带的MSU。此相关Id参数由发送M2UA分配。相关Id的目的是允许新激活的ASP将其对每个有序流中的流量的处理与广播组中的其他ASP同步。

contents.text: The format for a Data Message with TTC PDU parameters is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 带有TTC PDU参数的数据报文格式如下：

contents.text: The Protocol Data field contains the MTP2-User application message in network byte order starting with the Length Indicator (LI) octet. The Japanese TTC variant uses the spare bits of the LI octet for priority.
contents.zh-CHS: 协议数据字段以网络字节顺序包含MTP2用户应用程序消息，从长度指示器（LI）八位字节开始。日本TTC变体使用LI八位字节的备用位作为优先级。

contents.text: The length of the Protocol Data and TTC Protocol Data MUST NOT exceed the length of a MTP2-User application message [2,3,5].
contents.zh-CHS: 协议数据和TTC协议数据的长度不得超过MTP2用户应用程序消息的长度[2,3,5]。

contents.text: 3.3.1.2 Data Acknowledge Message
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3.1.2 数据确认消息

contents.text: The Data Acknowledge message contains the Correlation Id of the Data message that the sending M2UA is acknowledging as successfully processed to the peer M2UA.
contents.zh-CHS: 数据确认消息包含发送M2UA向对等M2UA确认已成功处理的数据消息的相关Id。

contents.text: The Data Acknowledge message contains the following parameter:
contents.zh-CHS: 数据确认消息包含以下参数：

contents.text: Correlation Id Mandatory
contents.zh-CHS: 相关Id是必需的

contents.text: The following format MUST be used for the Data Ack Message:
contents.zh-CHS: 数据确认消息必须使用以下格式：

contents.text: The Correlation Id parameter of the Data message and the Data Ack message provide a mechanism, for those SG implementations capable of taking advantage of them, to obtain an acknowledgment that the MSU has been transferred to the M2UA peer before acknowledging the MSU to
contents.zh-CHS: 数据消息和数据确认消息的相关Id参数为那些能够利用它们的SG实现提供了一种机制，以在将MSU确认为已被传输到M2UA对等方之前获得MSU已被传输到M2UA对等方的确认

contents.text: the SS7 peer, removing the risk of losing messages due to association failure or SCTP congestion.
contents.zh-CHS: SS7对等，消除了由于关联失败或SCTP拥塞而丢失消息的风险。

contents.text: The Data Ack message MUST be sent if a Correlation Id parameter is received from the peer. Otherwise, the Data Ack message MUST NOT be sent.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果从对等方接收到相关Id参数，则必须发送数据确认消息。否则，不得发送数据确认消息。

contents.text: If the Data Acknowledge is not sent for Correlation Id(s) or is sent with Invalid Correlation Id(s), the SS7 link will eventually fail due to lack of MTP Level 2 acknowledgments of the SS7 peer's MSUs.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果数据确认未针对相关Id发送，或发送时相关Id无效，则SS7链路最终将因缺少SS7对等方MSU的MTP 2级确认而失败。

contents.text: 3.3.1.3 Establish (Request, Confirmation)

The Establish Request message is used to establish the SS7 link or to indicate that the channel has been established. The MGC controls the state of the SS7 link. When the MGC desires the SS7 link to be in-service, it will send the Establish Request message. Note that the SGP MAY already have the SS7 link established at its layer. If so, upon receipt of an Establish Request, the SGP takes no action except to send an Establish Confirm.
contents.zh-CHS: 建立请求消息用于建立SS7链路或指示信道已建立。MGC控制SS7链路的状态。当MGC希望SS7链路处于服务状态时，它将发送建立请求消息。注意，SGP可能已经在其层建立了SS7链路。如果是，在收到建立请求后，SGP不采取任何行动，只发送建立确认。

contents.text: When the MGC sends an M2UA Establish Request message, the MGC MAY start a timer. This timer would be stopped upon receipt of an M2UA Establish Confirm. If the timer expires, the MGC would resend the M2UA Establish Request message and restart the timer. In other words, the MGC MAY continue to request the establishment of the data link on a periodic basis until the desired state is achieved or some other action is taken (notify the Management Layer).
contents.zh-CHS: 当MGC发送M2UA建立请求消息时，MGC可以启动计时器。收到M2UA建立确认后，该计时器将停止。如果计时器过期，MGC将重新发送M2UA建立请求消息并重新启动计时器。换言之，MGC可继续定期请求建立数据链路，直到达到所需状态或采取某种其他行动（通知管理层）。

contents.text: The mode (Normal or Emergency) for bringing the SS7 link in service is defaulted to Normal. The State Request (described in Section 3.3.1.5 below) can be used to change the mode to Emergency.
contents.zh-CHS: 使SS7链路投入服务的模式（正常或紧急）默认为正常。状态请求（如下文第3.3.1.5节所述）可用于将模式更改为紧急模式。

contents.text: 3.3.1.4 Release (Request, Indication, Confirmation)
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3.1.4 发布（请求、指示、确认）

contents.text: This Release Request message is used to release the channel. The Release Confirm and Indication messages are used to indicate that the channel has been released.
contents.zh-CHS: 此释放请求消息用于释放通道。释放确认和指示消息用于指示通道已释放。

contents.text: 3.3.1.5 State Request

The State Request message can be sent from a MGC to cause an action on a particular SS7 link supported by the Signalling Gateway Process. The SGP sends a State Confirm to the MGC if the action has been successfully completed. The State Confirm reflects that state value received in the State Request message.
contents.zh-CHS: 可以从MGC发送状态请求消息，以便在信令网关进程支持的特定SS7链路上执行操作。如果操作已成功完成，SGP将向MGC发送状态确认。状态确认反映在状态请求消息中接收到的状态值。

contents.text: The State Request message contains the following parameter:
contents.zh-CHS: 状态请求消息包含以下参数：

contents.text: State (mandatory)
contents.zh-CHS: 国家（强制性）

contents.text: The valid values for State are shown in the following table.
contents.zh-CHS: 状态的有效值如下表所示。

contents.text: Define Value Description STATUS_LPO_SET 0x0 Request local processor outage STATUS_LPO_CLEAR 0x1 Request local processor outage recovered STATUS_EMER_SET 0x2 Request emergency alignment STATUS_EMER_CLEAR 0x3 Request normal alignment (cancel emergency) STATUS_FLUSH_BUFFERS 0x4 Flush or clear receive, transmit and retransmit queues STATUS_CONTINUE 0x5 Continue or Resume STATUS_CLEAR_RTB 0x6 Clear the retransmit queue STATUS_AUDIT 0x7 Audit state of link STATUS_CONG_CLEAR 0x8 Congestion cleared STATUS_CONG_ACCEPT 0x9 Congestion accept STATUS_CONG_DISCARD 0xa Congestion discard
contents.zh-CHS: 定义值描述状态\u LPO\u集合0x0请求本地处理器中断状态\u LPO\u清除0x1请求本地处理器中断恢复状态\u紧急\u集合0x2请求紧急对齐状态\u紧急清除0x3请求正常对齐（取消紧急）状态\u刷新\u缓冲区0x4刷新或清除接收，传输和重传队列状态\u继续0x5继续或恢复状态\u清除\u RTB 0x6清除重传队列状态\u审核0x7审核链路状态\u通信\u清除0x8拥塞清除状态\u通信\u接受0x9拥塞接受状态\u通信\u丢弃0xa拥塞丢弃

contents.text: 3.3.1.6 State Confirm
The State Confirm message will be sent by the SGP in response to a State Request from the MGC. The State Confirm reflects that state value received in the State Request message.
contents.zh-CHS: SGP将发送状态确认消息，以响应MGC的状态请求。状态确认反映在状态请求消息中接收到的状态值。

contents.text: The State Confirm message contains the following parameter:
contents.zh-CHS: 状态确认消息包含以下参数：

contents.text: State (mandatory)
contents.zh-CHS: 国家（强制性）

contents.text: The valid values for State are shown in the following table. The value of the State field SHOULD reflect the value received in the State Request message.
contents.zh-CHS: 状态的有效值如下表所示。状态字段的值应反映在状态请求消息中接收到的值。

contents.text: Define Value Description STATUS_LPO_SET 0x0 Request local processor outage STATUS_LPO_CLEAR 0x1 Request local processor outage recovered STATUS_EMER_SET 0x2 Request emergency alignment STATUS_EMER_CLEAR 0x3 Request normal alignment (cancel emergency) STATUS_FLUSH_BUFFERS 0x4 Flush or clear receive, transmit and retransmit queues STATUS_CONTINUE 0x5 Continue or Resume STATUS_CLEAR_RTB 0x6 Clear the retransmit queue STATUS_AUDIT 0x7 Audit state of link STATUS_CONG_CLEAR 0x8 Congestion cleared STATUS_CONG_ACCEPT 0x9 Congestion accept STATUS_CONG_DISCARD 0xa Congestion discard
contents.zh-CHS: 定义值描述状态\u LPO\u集合0x0请求本地处理器中断状态\u LPO\u清除0x1请求本地处理器中断恢复状态\u紧急\u集合0x2请求紧急对齐状态\u紧急清除0x3请求正常对齐（取消紧急）状态\u刷新\u缓冲区0x4刷新或清除接收，传输和重传队列状态\u继续0x5继续或恢复状态\u清除\u RTB 0x6清除重传队列状态\u审核0x7审核链路状态\u通信\u清除0x8拥塞清除状态\u通信\u接受0x9拥塞接受状态\u通信\u丢弃0xa拥塞丢弃

contents.text: 3.3.1.7 State Indication
The MTP2 State Indication message can be sent from a SGP to an ASP to indicate a condition on a SS7 link.
contents.zh-CHS: MTP2状态指示消息可以从SGP发送到ASP，以指示SS7链路上的状态。

contents.text: The State Indication message contains the following parameter:
contents.zh-CHS: 状态指示消息包含以下参数：

contents.text: Event (mandatory)
contents.zh-CHS: 事件（强制性）

contents.text: The valid values for Event are shown in the following table.
contents.zh-CHS: 事件的有效值如下表所示。

contents.text: Define Value Description EVENT_RPO_ENTER 0x1 Remote entered processor outage EVENT_RPO_EXIT 0x2 Remote exited processor outage EVENT_LPO_ENTER 0x3 Link entered processor outage EVENT_LPO_EXIT 0x4 Link exited processor outage
contents.zh-CHS: 定义值描述事件\u RPO\u输入0x1远程输入的处理器中断事件\u RPO\u退出0x2远程退出的处理器中断事件\u LPO\u输入0x3链接输入的处理器中断事件\u LPO\u退出0x4链接退出的处理器中断

contents.text: 3.3.1.8 Congestion Indication

The Congestion Indication message can be sent from a Signalling Gateway Process to an ASP to indicate the congestion status and discard status of a SS7 link. When the MSU buffer fill increases above an Onset threshold or decreases below an Abatement threshold or crosses a Discard threshold in either direction, the SGP SHALL send a congestion indication message when it supports SS7 MTP2 variants that support multiple congestion levels.
contents.zh-CHS: 拥塞指示消息可以从信令网关进程发送到ASP，以指示SS7链路的拥塞状态和丢弃状态。当MSU缓冲区填充增加到起始阈值以上，或减少到缓解阈值以下，或在任一方向超过丢弃阈值时，SGP应在其支持支持多个拥塞级别的SS7 MTP2变体时发送拥塞指示消息。

contents.text: The SGP SHALL send the message only when there is actually a change in either the discard level or the congestion level to report, meaning it is different from the previously sent message. In addition, the SGP SHALL use an implementation dependent algorithm to limit the frequency of congestion indication messages.
contents.zh-CHS: 只有当要报告的丢弃级别或拥塞级别实际发生变化时，SGP才应发送消息，这意味着它与之前发送的消息不同。此外，SGP应使用依赖于实现的算法来限制拥塞指示消息的频率。

contents.text: An implementation may optionally send Congestion Indication messages on a "high priority" stream in order to potentially reduce delay.
contents.zh-CHS: 实现可以可选地在“高优先级”流上发送拥塞指示消息，以便潜在地减少延迟。

contents.text: The Congestion Indication message contains the following parameters:
contents.zh-CHS: 拥塞指示消息包含以下参数：

contents.text: Congestion Status (mandatory) Discard Status (optional)
contents.zh-CHS: 拥塞状态（强制）放弃状态（可选）

contents.text: The valid values for Congestion Status and Discard Status are shown in the following table.
contents.zh-CHS: 拥塞状态和丢弃状态的有效值如下表所示。

contents.text: Define Value Description LEVEL_NONE 0x0 No congestion LEVEL_1 0x1 Congestion Level 1 LEVEL_2 0x2 Congestion Level 2 LEVEL_3 0x3 Congestion Level 3
contents.zh-CHS: 定义值描述级别\u无0x0无拥塞级别\u 1 0x1拥塞级别1级别\u 2 0x2拥塞级别2级别\u 3 0x3拥塞级别3

contents.text: For SS7 networks that do not support multiple levels of congestion, only the LEVEL_NONE and LEVEL_3 values will be used. For SS7 networks that support multiple levels of congestion, it is possible for all values to be used. Refer to [2], [3] and [12] for more details on the Congestion and Discard Status of SS7 signalling links.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于不支持多个拥塞级别的SS7网络，将仅使用级别_NONE和级别_3的值。对于支持多级拥塞的SS7网络，可以使用所有值。有关SS7信令链路的拥塞和丢弃状态的更多详细信息，请参阅[2]、[3]和[12]。

contents.text: 3.3.1.9 Retrieval Request

The MTP2 Retrieval Request message is used during the MTP Level 3 changeover procedure to request the BSN, to retrieve PDUs from the transmit and retransmit queues or to flush PDUs from the retransmit queue. Examples of the use of Retrieval Request for SS7 Link Changeover are provided in Section 5.3.6.
contents.zh-CHS: MTP2检索请求消息在MTP级别3转换过程中用于请求BSN、从传输和重传队列检索PDU或从重传队列刷新PDU。第5.3.6节提供了SS7链路转换检索请求的使用示例。

contents.text: The Retrieval Request message contains the following parameters:
contents.zh-CHS: 检索请求消息包含以下参数：

contents.text: Action (mandatory) Sequence Number (optional)
contents.zh-CHS: 操作（强制）序列号（可选）

contents.text: The valid values for Action are shown in the following table.
contents.zh-CHS: 下表显示了操作的有效值。

contents.text: Define Value Description ACTION_RTRV_BSN 0x1 Retrieve the backward sequence number ACTION_RTRV_MSGS 0x2 Retrieve the PDUs from the transmit and retransmit queues
contents.zh-CHS: 定义值描述操作\u RTRV\u BSN 0x1检索向后序列号操作\u RTRV\u MSGS 0x2从传输和重新传输队列检索PDU

contents.text: In the Retrieval Request message, the Sequence Number field SHOULD NOT be present if the Action field is ACTION_RTRV_BSN. The Sequence Number field contains the Forward Sequence Number (FSN) of the far end if the Action is ACTION_RTRV_MSGS.
contents.zh-CHS: 在检索请求消息中，如果操作字段为Action\u RTRV\u BSN，则序列号字段不应出现。如果操作为Action_RTRV_MSGS，则序列号字段包含远端的前向序列号（FSN）。

contents.text: 3.3.1.10 Retrieval Confirm

The MTP2 Retrieval Confirm message is sent by the Signalling Gateway in response to a Retrieval Request message. Examples of the use of the Retrieval Confirm for SS7 Link Changeover are provided in Section 5.3.6.
contents.zh-CHS: MTP2检索确认消息由信令网关发送，以响应检索请求消息。第5.3.6节提供了SS7链路转换使用检索确认的示例。

contents.text: The Retrieval Confirm message contains the following parameters:
contents.zh-CHS: 检索确认消息包含以下参数：

contents.text: Action (mandatory) Result (mandatory) Sequence Number (optional)
contents.zh-CHS: 操作（强制）结果（强制）序列号（可选）

contents.text: The valid values for Action are the same as in Retrieval Request.
contents.zh-CHS: 操作的有效值与检索请求中的值相同。

contents.text: The values for Result are shown below:
contents.zh-CHS: 结果值如下所示：

contents.text: Define Value Description RESULT_SUCCESS 0x0 Action successful RESULT_FAILURE 0x1 Action failed
contents.zh-CHS: 定义值说明结果\u成功0x0操作成功结果\u失败0x1操作失败

contents.text: When the Signalling Gateway Process sends a Retrieval Confirm to a Retrieval Request, it echos the Action field. If the Action was ACTION_RTRV_BSN and the SGP successfully retrieved the BSN, the SGP will put the Backward Sequence Number (BSN) in the Sequence Number field and will indicate a success in the Result field. If the BSN could not be retrieved, the Sequence Number field will not be included and the Result field will indicate failure.
contents.zh-CHS: 当信令网关进程向检索请求发送检索确认时，它会回显操作字段。如果操作为Action_RTRV_BSN，且SGP成功检索BSN，则SGP将在序列号字段中放置反向序列号（BSN），并在结果字段中指示成功。如果无法检索BSN，则不包括序列号字段，结果字段将指示失败。

contents.text: For a Retrieval Confirm with Action of ACTION_RTRV_MSGS, the value of the Result field will indicate success or failure. A failure means that the buffers could not be retrieved. The Sequence Number field is not used with ACTION_RTRV_MSGS.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于带有Action_RTRV_MSGS操作的检索确认，结果字段的值将指示成功或失败。失败意味着无法检索缓冲区。序列号字段不与操作\u RTRV\u MSGS一起使用。

contents.text: 3.3.1.11 Retrieval Indication

The Retrieval Indication message is sent by the Signalling Gateway with a PDU from the transmit or retransmit queue. The Retrieval Indication message does not contain the Action or Sequence Number fields, just a MTP3 Protocol Data Unit (PDU) from the transmit or retransmit queue. Examples of the use of the Retrieval Indication for SS7 Link Changeover are provided in Section 5.3.6.
contents.zh-CHS: 检索指示消息由信令网关通过PDU从传输或重传队列发送。检索指示消息不包含操作或序列号字段，仅包含来自传输或重传队列的MTP3协议数据单元（PDU）。第5.3.6节提供了SS7链路转换检索指示的使用示例。

contents.text: For TTC Data messages, the following parameter will be used to indicate a TTC PDU which starts at LI.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于TTC数据消息，以下参数将用于指示从LI开始的TTC PDU。

contents.text: The M2UA implementation MAY consider the use of the bundling feature of SCTP for Retrieval Indication messages.
contents.zh-CHS: M2UA实现可以考虑使用SCTP的捆绑特征来检索指示消息。

contents.text: 3.3.1.12 Retrieval Complete Indication
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3.1.12 检索完全指示

contents.text: The MTP2 Retrieval Complete Indication message is exactly the same as the MTP2 Retrieval Indication message except that it also indicates that retrieval is complete. In addition, it MAY contain a PDU (which MUST be the last PDU) from the transmit or retransmit queue.
contents.zh-CHS: MTP2检索完成指示消息与MTP2检索指示消息完全相同，只是它也指示检索完成。此外，它可能包含来自传输或重传队列的PDU（必须是最后一个PDU）。

contents.text: 3.3.2 Application Server Process Maintenance (ASPM) Messages
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3.2 应用程序服务器进程维护（ASPM）消息

contents.text: The ASPM messages will only use the common message header.
contents.zh-CHS: ASPM消息将仅使用公共消息头。

contents.text: 3.3.2.1 ASP Up (ASPUP)
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3.2.1 ASP Up（ASUP）

contents.text: The ASP Up (ASPUP) message is used to indicate to a remote M2UA peer that the Adaptation layer is ready to receive traffic or maintenance messages.
contents.zh-CHS: ASP Up（ASUP）消息用于向远程M2UA对等方指示适配层已准备好接收流量或维护消息。

contents.text: The ASPUP message contains the following parameters
contents.zh-CHS: ASPUP消息包含以下参数

contents.text: ASP Identifier (optional) Info String (optional)
contents.zh-CHS: ASP标识符（可选）信息字符串（可选）

contents.text: Note: The ASP Identifier MUST be used where the SGP cannot identify the ASP by pre-configured address/port number information (e.g., where an ASP is resident on a Host using dynamic address/port number assignment).
contents.zh-CHS: 注意：如果SGP无法通过预配置的地址/端口号信息识别ASP，则必须使用ASP标识符（例如，ASP驻留在使用动态地址/端口号分配的主机上）。

contents.text: The format for ASPUP Message parameters is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: ASPUP消息参数的格式如下所示：

contents.text: The optional ASP Identifier parameter would contain a unique value that is locally significant among the ASPs that support an AS. The SGP should save the ASP Identifier to be used, if necessary, with the Notify message (see Section 3.3.3.2).
contents.zh-CHS: 可选的ASP标识符参数将包含一个唯一的值，该值在支持AS的ASP中具有本地意义。SGP应保存ASP标识符，以便在必要时与Notify消息一起使用（见第3.3.3.2节）。

contents.text: The optional INFO String parameter can carry any meaningful UTF-8 [6] character string along with the message. Length of the INFO String parameter is from 0 to 255 octets. No procedures are presently identified for its use but the INFO String MAY be used for debugging purposes.
contents.zh-CHS: 可选信息字符串参数可以携带任何有意义的UTF-8[6]字符串以及消息。信息字符串参数的长度为0到255个八位字节。目前还没有确定其使用的过程，但信息字符串可用于调试目的。

contents.text: 3.3.2.2 ASP Up Ack
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3.2.2 ASP向上确认

contents.text: The ASP Up Ack message is used to acknowledge an ASP Up message received from a remote M2UA peer.
contents.zh-CHS: ASP Up Ack消息用于确认从远程M2UA对等方接收到的ASP Up消息。

contents.text: The ASPUP Ack message contains the following parameters:
contents.zh-CHS: ASUP Ack消息包含以下参数：

contents.text: INFO String (optional)
contents.zh-CHS: 信息字符串（可选）

contents.text: The format for ASPUP Ack Message parameters is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: ASPUP Ack消息参数的格式如下：

contents.text: The format and description of the optional Info String parameter is the same as for the ASP UP message (See Section 3.3.2.1).
contents.zh-CHS: 可选信息字符串参数的格式和说明与ASP UP消息的格式和说明相同（见第3.3.2.1节）。

contents.text: 3.3.2.3 ASP Down (ASPDN)
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3.2.3 ASP关闭（ASPDN）

contents.text: The ASP Down (ASPDN) message is used to indicate to a remote M2UA peer that the adaptation layer is not ready to receive traffic or maintenance messages.
contents.zh-CHS: ASP Down（ASPDN）消息用于向远程M2UA对等方指示适配层尚未准备好接收流量或维护消息。

contents.text: The ASPDN message contains the following parameters
contents.zh-CHS: ASPDN消息包含以下参数

contents.text: INFO String (optional)
contents.zh-CHS: 信息字符串（可选）

contents.text: The format for the ASPDN message parameters is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: ASPDN消息参数的格式如下所示：

contents.text: The format and description of the optional Info String parameter is the same as for the ASP Up message (See Section 3.3.2.1).
contents.zh-CHS: 可选信息字符串参数的格式和说明与ASP Up消息的格式和说明相同（见第3.3.2.1节）。

contents.text: 3.3.2.4 ASP Down Ack
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3.2.4 ASP向下确认

contents.text: The ASP Down Ack message is used to acknowledge an ASP Down message received from a remote M2UA peer.
contents.zh-CHS: ASP Down Ack消息用于确认从远程M2UA对等方接收到的ASP Down消息。

contents.text: The ASP Down Ack message contains the following parameters:
contents.zh-CHS: ASP Down Ack消息包含以下参数：

contents.text: INFO String (optional)
contents.zh-CHS: 信息字符串（可选）

contents.text: The format for the ASPDN Ack message parameters is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: ASPDN Ack消息参数的格式如下：

contents.text: The format and description of the optional Info String parameter is the same as for the ASP UP message (See Section 3.3.2.1).
contents.zh-CHS: 可选信息字符串参数的格式和说明与ASP UP消息的格式和说明相同（见第3.3.2.1节）。

contents.text: 3.3.2.5 Heartbeat (BEAT)
The Heartbeat message is optionally used to ensure that the M2UA peers are still available to each other.
contents.zh-CHS: 心跳消息可选择性地用于确保M2UA对等点彼此仍然可用。

contents.text: The BEAT message contains the following parameter:
contents.zh-CHS: 节拍消息包含以下参数：

contents.text: Heartbeat Data Optional
contents.zh-CHS: 心跳数据可选

contents.text: The format for the BEAT message is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 节拍信息的格式如下：

contents.text: The sending node defines the Heartbeat Data field contents. It may include a Heartbeat Sequence Number and/or time stamp, or other implementation specific details.
contents.zh-CHS: 发送节点定义心跳数据字段内容。它可能包括心跳序列号和/或时间戳，或其他特定于实现的细节。

contents.text: The receiver of a Heartbeat message does not process this field as it is only of significance to the sender. The receiver echoes the content of the Heartbeat Data in a BEAT ACK message.
contents.zh-CHS: 心跳消息的接收者不处理此字段，因为它仅对发送者重要。接收器在拍确认消息中回显心跳数据的内容。

contents.text: 3.3.2.6 Heartbeat Ack (BEAT ACK)
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3.2.6 心跳确认（心跳确认）

contents.text: The Heartbeat ACK message is sent in response to a BEAT message. A peer MUST send a BEAT ACK in response to a BEAT message. It includes all the parameters of the received Heartbeat message, without any change.
contents.zh-CHS: 心跳确认消息是响应节拍消息而发送的。对等方必须发送节拍确认以响应节拍消息。它包括接收到的心跳消息的所有参数，没有任何更改。

contents.text: The BEAT ACK message contains the following parameter:
contents.zh-CHS: 节拍确认消息包含以下参数：

contents.text: Heartbeat Data Optional
contents.zh-CHS: 心跳数据可选

contents.text: The format for the BEAT ACK message is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 节拍确认信息的格式如下：

contents.text: The sending node defines the Heartbeat Data field contents. It may include a Heartbeat Sequence Number and/or time stamp, or other implementation specific details.
contents.zh-CHS: 发送节点定义心跳数据字段内容。它可能包括心跳序列号和/或时间戳，或其他特定于实现的细节。

contents.text: The receiver of a Heartbeat message does not process this field as it is only of significance to the sender. The receiver echoes the content of the Heartbeat Data in a BEAT ACK message.
contents.zh-CHS: 心跳消息的接收者不处理此字段，因为它仅对发送者重要。接收器在拍确认消息中回显心跳数据的内容。

contents.text: 3.3.2.7 ASP Active (ASPAC)
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3.2.7 ASP活动（ASPAC）

contents.text: The ASPAC message is sent by an ASP to indicate to an SGP that it is Active and ready to be used.
contents.zh-CHS: ASPAC消息由ASP发送，以向SGP指示其处于活动状态并准备好使用。

contents.text: The ASPAC message contains the following parameters:
contents.zh-CHS: ASPAC消息包含以下参数：

contents.text: Traffic Mode Type (optional) Interface Identifier (optional) - Combination of integer and integer ranges, OR - string (text formatted) INFO String (optional)
contents.zh-CHS: 交通模式类型（可选）接口标识符（可选）-整数和整数范围的组合，或-字符串（文本格式）信息字符串（可选）

contents.text: The format for the ASPAC message using integer formatted Interface Identifiers is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 使用整数格式接口标识符的ASPAC消息格式如下：

contents.text: The format for the ASPAC message using text formatted (string) Interface Identifiers is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 使用文本格式（字符串）接口标识符的ASPAC消息格式如下：

contents.text: The Traffic Mode Type parameter identifies the traffic mode of operation of the ASP within an AS. The valid values for Type are shown in the following table:
contents.zh-CHS: Traffic Mode Type参数标识AS中ASP的运行流量模式。类型的有效值如下表所示：

contents.text: Value Description 0x1 Override 0x2 Load-share 0x3 Broadcast
contents.zh-CHS: 值说明0x1覆盖0x2加载共享0x3广播

contents.text: Within a particular AS, only one Traffic Mode Type can be used. The Override value indicates that the ASP is operating in Override mode, where the ASP takes over all traffic in an Application Server (i.e., primary/backup operation), over-riding any currently active ASPs in the AS. In Load-share mode, the ASP will share in the traffic distribution with any other currently active ASPs. In Broadcast mode, all of the Active ASPs receive all message traffic in the Application Server.
contents.zh-CHS: 在特定AS中，只能使用一种交通模式类型。Override值表示ASP正在Override模式下运行，在此模式下，ASP接管应用程序服务器中的所有流量（即主/备份操作），超过AS中任何当前活动的ASP。在负载共享模式下，ASP将与任何其他当前活动的ASP共享流量分布。在广播模式下，所有活动的ASP接收应用服务器中的所有消息流量。

contents.text: The optional Interface Identifiers parameter contains a list of Interface Identifier integers (Type 0x1 or Type 0x8) or text strings (Type 0x3)indexing the Application Server traffic that the sending ASP is configured/registered to receive. If integer formatted Interface Identifiers are being used, the ASP can also send ranges of Interface Identifiers (Type 0x8). Interface Identifier types Integer (0x1) and Integer Range (0x8) are allowed in the same message. Text formatted Interface Identifiers (0x3) cannot be used with either Integer (0x1) or Integer Range (0x8) types.
contents.zh-CHS: 可选的Interface Identifiers参数包含接口标识符整数（类型0x1或类型0x8）或文本字符串（类型0x3）列表，用于索引发送ASP配置/注册为接收的应用程序服务器流量。如果使用整数格式的接口标识符，ASP还可以发送接口标识符的范围（类型0x8）。同一消息中允许使用Integer（0x1）和Integer Range（0x8）接口标识符类型。文本格式的接口标识符（0x3）不能与整数（0x1）或整数范围（0x8）类型一起使用。

contents.text: If no Interface Identifiers are included, the message is for all provisioned Interface Identifiers within the AS(s) in which the ASP is provisioned. If only a subset of Interface Identifiers for an AS are included, the ASP is noted as Active for all the Interface Identifiers provisioned for that AS.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果未包括任何接口标识符，则该消息适用于配置ASP的AS中的所有已配置接口标识符。如果仅包括AS的接口标识符子集，则对于为该AS提供的所有接口标识符，ASP将被视为活动的。

contents.text: Note: If the optional Interface Identifier parameter is present, the integer formatted Interface Identifier MUST be supported, while the text formatted Interface Identifier MAY be supported.
contents.zh-CHS: 注意：如果存在可选接口标识符参数，则必须支持整数格式的接口标识符，而可能支持文本格式的接口标识符。

contents.text: An SGP that receives an ASPAC with an incorrect or unsupported Traffic Mode Type for a particular Interface Identifier will respond with an Error Message (Cause: Unsupported Traffic Handling Mode).
contents.zh-CHS: 接收特定接口标识符的ASPAC具有不正确或不受支持的流量模式类型的SGP将以错误消息（原因：不受支持的流量处理模式）进行响应。

contents.text: The format and description of the optional Info String parameter is the same as for the ASP UP message (See Section 3.3.2.1).
contents.zh-CHS: 可选信息字符串参数的格式和说明与ASP UP消息的格式和说明相同（见第3.3.2.1节）。

contents.text: 3.3.2.8 ASP Active Ack
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3.2.8 ASP活动确认

contents.text: The ASP Active (ASPAC) Ack message is used to acknowledge an ASP Active message received from a remote M2UA peer.
contents.zh-CHS: ASP Active（ASPAC）Ack消息用于确认从远程M2UA对等方接收到的ASP Active消息。

contents.text: The ASPAC Ack message contains the following parameters:
contents.zh-CHS: ASPAC Ack消息包含以下参数：

contents.text: Traffic Mode Type (optional) Interface Identifier (optional) - Combination of integer and integer ranges, OR - string (text formatted) INFO String (optional)
contents.zh-CHS: 交通模式类型（可选）接口标识符（可选）-整数和整数范围的组合，或-字符串（文本格式）信息字符串（可选）

contents.text: The format for the ASPAC Ack message with Integer-formatted Interface Identifiers is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 带有整数格式接口标识符的ASPAC Ack消息格式如下：

contents.text: The format for the ASP Active Ack message using text formatted (string) Interface Identifiers is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 使用文本格式（字符串）接口标识符的ASP活动确认消息的格式如下：

contents.text: The format and description of the optional Info String parameter is the same as for the ASP Up message (See Section 3.3.2.1).
contents.zh-CHS: 可选信息字符串参数的格式和说明与ASP Up消息的格式和说明相同（见第3.3.2.1节）。

contents.text: The format of the optional Interface Identifier parameter is the same as for the ASP Active message (See Section 3.3.2.7).
contents.zh-CHS: 可选接口标识符参数的格式与ASP活动消息的格式相同（见第3.3.2.7节）。

contents.text: The format and description of the optional Info String parameter is the same as for the ASP Up message (See Section 3.3.2.1).
contents.zh-CHS: 可选信息字符串参数的格式和说明与ASP Up消息的格式和说明相同（见第3.3.2.1节）。

contents.text: 3.3.2.9 ASP Inactive (ASPIA)
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3.2.9 ASP非活动（ASPIA）

contents.text: The ASP Inactive (ASPIA) message is sent by an ASP to indicate to an SGP that it is no longer an active ASP to be used from within a list of ASPs. The SGP will respond with an ASPIA Ack message and either discard incoming messages or buffer for a timed period and then discard.
contents.zh-CHS: ASP非活动（ASPIA）消息由ASP发送，以向SGP指示它不再是要从ASP列表中使用的活动ASP。SGP将使用ASPIA Ack消息进行响应，并在一段时间内丢弃传入消息或缓冲区，然后丢弃。

contents.text: The ASPIA message contains the following parameters:
contents.zh-CHS: ASPIA消息包含以下参数：

contents.text: Interface Identifiers (optional) - Combination of integer and integer ranges, OR - string (text formatted) INFO String (optional)
contents.zh-CHS: 接口标识符（可选）-整数和整数范围的组合，或-字符串（文本格式）信息字符串（可选）

contents.text: The format for the ASP Inactive message parameters using Integer formatted Interface Identifiers is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 使用整数格式接口标识符的ASP非活动消息参数的格式如下：

contents.text: The format for the ASP Inactive message using text formatted (string) Interface Identifiers is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 使用文本格式（字符串）接口标识符的ASP非活动消息的格式如下：

contents.text: The format of the optional Interface Identifier parameter is the same as for the ASP Active message (See Section 3.3.2.7).
contents.zh-CHS: 可选接口标识符参数的格式与ASP活动消息的格式相同（见第3.3.2.7节）。

contents.text: The format and description of the optional Info String parameter is the same as for the ASP Up message (See Section 3.3.2.1).
contents.zh-CHS: 可选信息字符串参数的格式和说明与ASP Up消息的格式和说明相同（见第3.3.2.1节）。

contents.text: The optional Interface Identifiers parameter contains a list of Interface Identifier integers indexing the Application Server traffic that the sending ASP is configured/registered to receive, but does not want to receive at this time.
contents.zh-CHS: 可选接口标识符参数包含一个接口标识符整数列表，用于索引发送ASP配置/注册为接收但此时不希望接收的应用程序服务器流量。

contents.text: 3.3.2.10 ASP Inactive Ack
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3.2.10 ASP非活动确认

contents.text: The ASP Inactive (ASPIA) Ack message is used to acknowledge an ASP Inactive message received from a remote M2UA peer.
contents.zh-CHS: ASP Inactive（ASPIA）Ack消息用于确认从远程M2UA对等方接收到的ASP Inactive消息。

contents.text: The ASPIA Ack message contains the following parameters:
contents.zh-CHS: ASPIA Ack消息包含以下参数：

contents.text: Interface Identifiers (optional) - Combination of integer and integer ranges, OR - string (text formatted) INFO String (optional)
contents.zh-CHS: 接口标识符（可选）-整数和整数范围的组合，或-字符串（文本格式）信息字符串（可选）

contents.text: The format for the ASPIA Ack message is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: ASPIA Ack消息的格式如下：

contents.text: The format for the ASP Inactive Ack message using text formatted (string) Interface Identifiers is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 使用文本格式（字符串）接口标识符的ASP非活动确认消息的格式如下：

contents.text: The format of the optional Interface Identifier parameter is the same as for the ASP Active message (See Section 3.3.2.7).
contents.zh-CHS: 可选接口标识符参数的格式与ASP活动消息的格式相同（见第3.3.2.7节）。

contents.text: The format and description of the optional Info String parameter is the same as for the ASP Up message (See Section 3.3.2.1).
contents.zh-CHS: 可选信息字符串参数的格式和说明与ASP Up消息的格式和说明相同（见第3.3.2.1节）。

contents.text: 3.3.3 Layer Management (MGMT) Messages
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3.3 层管理（MGMT）消息

contents.text: 3.3.3.1 Error (ERR)

The Error (ERR) message is used to notify a peer of an error event associated with an incoming message. For example, the message type might be unexpected given the current state, or a parameter value might be invalid.
contents.zh-CHS: 错误（ERR）消息用于通知对等方与传入消息关联的错误事件。例如，给定当前状态，消息类型可能是意外的，或者参数值可能无效。

contents.text: An Error message MUST not be generated in response to other Error messages.
contents.zh-CHS: 不得生成错误消息以响应其他错误消息。

contents.text: The ERR message contains the following parameters:
contents.zh-CHS: ERR消息包含以下参数：

contents.text: Error Code (mandatory) Interface Identifier (optional) Diagnostic Information (optional)
contents.zh-CHS: 错误代码（必需）接口标识符（可选）诊断信息（可选）

contents.text: The format for the ERR message is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: ERR消息的格式如下所示：

contents.text: The Error Code parameter indicates the reason for the Error Message. The Error parameter value can be one of the following values:
contents.zh-CHS: Error Code参数指示错误消息的原因。错误参数值可以是以下值之一：

contents.text: Invalid Version 0x1 Invalid Interface Identifier 0x2 Unsupported Message Class 0x3 Unsupported Message Type 0x4 Unsupported Traffic Handling Mode 0x5 Unexpected Message 0x6 Protocol Error 0x7 Unsupported Interface Identifier Type 0x8 Invalid Stream Identifier 0x9 Not Used in M2UA 0xa Not Used in M2UA 0xb Not Used in M2UA 0xc Refused - Management Blocking 0xd ASP Identifier Required 0xe Invalid ASP Identifier 0xf ASP Active for Interface Identifier(s) 0x10 Invalid Parameter Value 0x11 Parameter Field Error 0x12 Unexpected Parameter 0x13 Not Used in M2UA 0x14 Not Used in M2UA 0x15 Missing Parameter 0x16
contents.zh-CHS: 无效版本0x1无效接口标识符0x2不支持的消息类0x3不支持的消息类型0x4不支持的流量处理模式0x5意外消息0x6协议错误0x7不支持的接口标识符类型0x8无效流标识符0x9未在M2UA中使用0xa未在M2UA中使用0xb未在M2UA中使用0xc拒绝-管理阻塞0xd ASP标识符必需0xe无效ASP标识符0xf ASP活动接口标识符0x10无效参数值0x11参数字段错误0x12意外参数0x13未在M2UA中使用0x14未在M2UA中使用0x15缺少参数0x16
